links.title: 36th Annual Roth Conference
links.content:
![](/upload/event_101113/logo.png)

undefined

# Home

Thank you for joining us for the **36th Annual ROTH Conference** on  _March 17-19, 2024_ held at The Ritz Carlton Laguna Niguel in Dana Point, California. Conference Stats: 

  * **5,500** 1-on-1 Meetings
  * **3,700** Total In Person Participants
  * **2,300** Virtual Participants
  * **440** Participating Companies
  * **140** Analyst Moderated Fireside Chats
  * **115** Sponsors 
  * **30** Industry Panels & Special Presentations
  * **35** Consumer Private Day & Emerging Brands Showcase Companies
  * **$100,000** Raised for CAF Charity 
  * **56,000** Individual Webcast Streams



[Home](conference_home.html?bank_access=0&event_id=101113) [Login](conference_invlogin.html?bank_access=0&event_id=101113) [Agenda](__agenda_cp.html) [Panels and Fireside Chats](conference_presentations.html?bank_access=0&event_id=101113) [Sponsors](__sponsor-list_cp.html)

# BENZINGA CANNABIS CAPITAL CONFERENCE

THE LEADING CANNABIS INVESTMENT & BRANDING CONFERENCE IN NORTH AMERICA

FALL 2024 | OCT 8-9

[ Marriott Magnificent Mile in Chicago, IL  ](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/benzinga-capital-conference-cannabis-fall-2024-tickets-858948065787?aff=hollywoodpromo)

[BUY TICKETS](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/benzinga-capital-conference-cannabis-fall-2024-tickets-858948065787?aff=hollywoodpromo) [Apply to Exhibit](https://www.benzinga.com/events/cannabis-conference/sponsor/) [Apply to Sponsor](https://www.benzinga.com/events/cannabis-conference/sponsor/)

### WHERE DEALS GET DONE

Join us at Benzinga’s Cannabis Capital Conference (CCC) in Chicago from October 8-9, just weeks before a pivotal November election that could shape the future of the cannabis industry.

CCC is the ultimate destination to raise capital, close deals, and find the perfect partners in cannabis. With 120+ speakers confirmed, including industry giants like George Archos (Verano), Ross Gerber (Gerber Kawasaki), Boris Jordan (Curaleaf), Charlie Bachtell (Cresco Labs), and Jim Belushi (Belushi’s Farm), this is your opportunity to network with the best in the business.

[Buy Tickets](#purchase-tickets) [Photo Gallery](https://www.benzinga.com/events/cannabis-conference/photo-gallery-fall-2024/) [Apply to Exhibit](https://www.benzinga.com/events/cannabis-conference/sponsor/) [Apply to Sponsor](https://www.benzinga.com/events/cannabis-conference/sponsor/)

### Scholarships for Women-owned & Minority-owned Businesses

**In partnership with:** [![](https://cannabis-eventscdn.benzinga.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/15131604/2.jpg)](https://www.facebook.com/WomenGrow/)[![](https://cannabis-eventscdn.benzinga.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/15131601/1.jpg)](https://www.facebook.com/bipocann/)

Diversity is more important than ever and Benzinga is committed to providing opportunities for women and minorities to succeed.

To that end, we’ve partnered with organizations like WomenGrow, BIPOCann, and others to offer earned opportunities for women and minority-owned businesses to be showcased on our conference stages and in our exhibit hall.

If your business should be among them, please contact us to learn more!

[Learn More](https://www.benzinga.com/events/cannabis-conference/invest-in-her)
